topic.title: 血型章节 Nar - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="882-1" ABO+RH血型代码 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (0003)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "血型" (0004)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="882-1" ABO+RH血型代码 (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (0003)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "血型" (0004)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <section xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <templateId root="Section_template_Root_OID.1"/> <id root="2097356831"/> <code code="882-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="ABO+RH血型代码"/> <title>血型</title> <text/> </section>
